<p align="justify"> 
{{< fa address-card size=large >}} I am the LeRoy Neiman Term Chair Professor of Sociology at the University of California, Los Angeles. 

Also: 
- Former co-editor of [*American Sociological Review*](https://journals.sagepub.com/home/asr).
- Former chair of the American Sociology Association's [Section for the Sociology of Culture](https://asaculturesection.org/). 
- Current member of the [Sociological Research Association](https://www.sociological-research-assoc.org/).
- Current member of the Board of Reviewing Editors of the journal [*Science*](https://www.science.org/journal/science).
- Associate editor for the journal [*Discover Data*](https://www.springer.com/journal/44248). 
- Next year, I will begin a three-year stint as one of the lead editors of the journal [*Sociological Theory*](https://journals.sagepub.com/home/stx) with [S. L. Crawley](http://sociology.usf.edu/faculty/scrawley/), [Z. Magubane](https://www.bc.edu/bc-web/schools/mcas/departments/sociology/people/faculty-directory/zine-magubane.html), and [V. Patil](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vrushali01). 
</p>

<p align="justify"> 
{{< fa chart-line size=large >}} I study culture, cognition, networks, theory, consumption, institutions, and organization.
</p>
